0110101001011100 1001011000101111 1 -> sum: 0000000010001100, cout: 1

0101101001001000 1011111000010101 0 -> sum: 0001100001011101, cout: 1
0001101110011111 1100110111011111 0 -> sum: 1110100101111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
